ON9BOT_TOKEN.description: Another Telegram bot token for the virtual player bot. Can be the same as TOKEN.

OWNER_ID.description: Telegram user id of the bot owner.

ADMIN_GROUP_ID.description: Telegram group id of the bot admin group. Error messages and word addition requests are sent here.

OFFICIAL_GROUP_ID.description: Telegram group id of the official group of the bot.

WORD_ADDITION_CHANNEL_ID.description: Telegram channel id of the channel to announce word additions.

VIP.description: A list of Telegram user ids designated as VIPs.

VIP_GROUP.description: A list of Telegram group ids designated as VIP groups.
